text: The United States presidential election in Arkansas, 1968 was held on November 5th, 1968. American Independent candidate George Wallace won the state with 235,627 votes, with Republican Richard Nixon winning 189,062 and Democrat Hubert Humphrey winning 184,901. With 38.65% of the popular vote, Arkansas would prove to be Wallace's weakest that he carried in the 1968 election after Alabama, Mississippi, Louisiana and Georgia. This would also be the last time until 2008 when Arkansas did not vote for the winner of the presidential election. ==Results== {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em
